籤詩版本二:
Sibophe ihhashi futhi sibambe isiswebhu, siza ngqo lapha, ingxenye isengozini futhi ingxenye isengozini.
Kufana nendlu eshiswa ngomlilo, uma izulu liwa imvula iphenduka umlotha, nginesu.
詩意:
Le hexagram imele usizi oluyingxenye nengxenye yenjabulo.
Kunconywa ukwenza okuhle kukho konke.
解曰: Umsebenzi wokuphila konke. Ungakhathazeki ngokulungile nokungalungile. Amaketanga awesikhashana. Ukucasuka kuyazenzekela.
